summary: An ordinance levying a special assessment to redeem the annual installments and interest to mature and become payable upon the bonds of Local Improvement District No. 98 issued under authority of Ordinance No. 3857 for the improvement of Willow Street, under Ordinance No. 3659 in accordance with the assessment roll of said district as approved by Ordinance No. 3752 providing for the collection thereof, and providing penalties for non-payment at maturity.
